narrator_morgan.name: Morgan Freeman Style
narrator_morgan.description: Warm, authoritative narrator voice perfect for documentaries and storytelling
narrator_morgan.sample_text: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn't take.

narrator_david.name: David Attenborough Style
narrator_david.description: Gentle, contemplative voice for nature and science content
narrator_david.sample_text: The natural world is full of extraordinary animals.

host_professional_male.name: Professional Host (Male)
host_professional_male.description: Clear, engaging voice for podcasts and presentations
host_professional_male.sample_text: Welcome back to the show! Today we have an exciting topic.

host_professional_female.name: Professional Host (Female)
host_professional_female.description: Warm, articulate voice for interviews and discussions
host_professional_female.sample_text: Thank you for joining us. Let's dive right in.

character_walter.name: Walter White Style
character_walter.description: Intense, measured voice - perfect for dramatic content
character_walter.sample_text: I am the one who knocks.

character_peter.name: Peter Griffin Style
character_peter.description: Comedic, animated voice for humorous content
character_peter.sample_text: You know what really grinds my gears?

educator_calm.name: Calm Educator
educator_calm.description: Patient, clear voice ideal for educational content
educator_calm.sample_text: Let me explain this concept step by step.

storyteller_dramatic.name: Dramatic Storyteller
storyteller_dramatic.description: Expressive voice for fiction and audiobooks
storyteller_dramatic.sample_text: It was a dark and stormy night...
